explanation: [0-0] A smiling man in a black shirt is standing in front of an oven, holding a long wooden handle in his hand. The other end of the handle is inside the oven.

[0-7] The man then pulls the wooden handle out of the oven, revealing a large black pot attached to the other end. Inside the pot, a large quantity of ribs is being cooked. As the camera zooms in, the surface of the ribs can be seen to be golden brown and crispy, and the broth is boiling.
